description: Designed for mobile professionals, the Belkin Executive Leather Folio is the perfect companion for your iPad. It not only protects your tablet device, but also gives you multiple options for using your device. Users can rotate between portrait and landscape with the adjustable stand, and use the elastic hand strap to hold the device while surfing the internet or presenting to clients. The Belkin Executive Folio's soft interior lining and secure corners keep your device securely in place, and the magnetized tab closure keeps the cover securely closed and your screen protected when not in use. Professional, durable & versatile.
title: Belkin Exective Leather Case / Folio for iPad 4th Gen, iPad 3 and iPad 2
